openconnector
Class Schema

java.lang.Object
  openconnector.Schema

public class Schema
extends java.lang.Object

A Schema describes the attributes that are supported in a resource object.

Nested Class Summary
static class Schema.Attribute
          The definition of a resource object attribute.
static class Schema.Type
          An enumeration of attribute types.

getGroupAttribute

public java.lang.String getGroupAttribute()
Determine which attribute in an account schema represents the "group" attribute. This is modeled with an Attribute having its objectType set to a value that matches one of the Schemas. Currently we only have one for groups, but in theory this can extend to allow references to objects of other complex types.
